title: Got my gift notification, but never saw what it was
body: Hi there. I recently downloaded League of Legends again so I could play with some friends and when I logged in last night, I received a notification saying I received a some sort of gift but I never knew if It was a skin or champion.

replies.body: That notification was most likely telling you about the recent Rift Rivals event going on! I'm not currently seeing any gifts on this account which makes me think that notification was actually eSports related.

really that's weird. I got a notification and it showed a wooden chest opening and I guess it gave me Riot Kayle cause I don't remember ever having that . or its just been a long time. oh well thanks for your time
When is the last time you logged in. Riot gifted that a couple of years ago i think.
last I logged on league was 7/09/2016 xd
